Perceptor/Talon:

Perceptor arrived to the room and looking to Tucson he said"We need to move 
Talon to the Cr too... After you have rested, I need to chat with you and 
Rodimus..."

Talon continued in a deep sleep and her face mirroed the pain that she was 
sufering.


-----Original Message----- 
From: Sandy
Sent: Wednesday, April 20, 2011 11:35 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: BATTLE at the Ark!

Tucson nodds to Perceptor.

"I'll do my best not to Perceptor.  Yes, I could use some down time also, 
but I'm apprehensive about doing that...  Something tells me someone could 
take advantage of me not being on my guard.."

Uproar and Quickstride now enter the lobby.

" Got that feeling too huh boss?"

Tucson turns to Uproar.

"Yes Uproar, I do.  The feeling that we're constantly being watched."

Uproar looks behind and then to his leader.

"I propose you allow us to guard the outer parameters of the Ark sir. You 
need repairs, and your energy levels are dangerously low."

Quickstride nodds.

"Yeah, it's a miracle you haven't gone off line yet.  I'm sure we can handle 
things, all of us.  You need down time big guy, badly."

Tucson sighs.

" I understand, I - just would not want to put anyone in - a dangerous 
situation."

Straight Shot looks to Tucson.

"That's it, you're fading on us, you're going to the CR chambers.  And not 
another word about not having the time for it!"

Tucson never argued with Straight Shot.  He'd never win even if his spark 
depended on it.

" You're right, as ususal Straight Shot. All right, I'll be in the Cr 
Chambers, recharging.  And I promise to allow myself the repairs and ample 
time needed for recovery.  Rodimus, you'll have to take over for me for a 
little while, and just be sure all of you are kept safe.  That's all I ask."
